text: ta-yaaɠo zɔɔlaiti ti ga zanugi, walii, ta kɔtu zɔngɔ ɓaagiti, naa ʋɛɛ kɔtu zɔngɔ ɓaagi ʋa é ga pɛɛlegi, ta geze ʋagɔ zeɠei, ta ma ɓɔigi, ta ma ɓɔi sɔsɔgi, naa ʋɛɛ soa zeɠei ʋa, ta gulɔ maku nɛɛnɛ guluiti ma zii pɛ, ta anii ma zii pɛ kpɛtɛai ga see ɲiigai, anii kpein kpɛtɛai ga gului nii pagai gola, naa ʋɛɛ kɔlu ɓɔigiti ba, ta kɔluiti, ta kɔtui daa ga maaleɓelegi,
